channel.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
channel.description:
<big> **Featured Auxy Artist #06: @Xicon** </big>
![32%20PM|690x148](upload://6so9453ExLFbavpZerv8RH7mzeE.jpg)
<big>E</big>kstrak was making music using Medly, MusicMakerJam & GarageBand but attributes Auxy with improving his musical career. This young producer used to live in Jamaica and made music under the names TerrariaShane, StardustBrainiac203, and SuperSonicBass. His EP _Reborn_ is due to drop in the next few weeks, including Drum & Bass, Dubstep & House. Click [here](https://soundcloud.com/shane-brown-97094682/reborn-preview) for a preview. He also enjoys drawing and playing drums in real life.
**Week starting: 5 Feb, 2018.** - Please listen to at least one of their tracks (or more) - Provide at least one Soundcloud comment / feedback about their music during their week. - Comment in this thread once you've provided any feedback
Check out their tracks here: https://soundcloud.com/shane-brown-97094682/tracks.
If you want to be in the weekly draw [add your name.](https://disco.auxy.co/t/forum-member-of-the-week-who-wants-to-be-involved/5518)
![5956_1|120x120](upload://j4v7QOD7rgB1NF8Ps0Ot6HqFRGB.jpg) ![5956_1|120x120](upload://j4v7QOD7rgB1NF8Ps0Ot6HqFRGB.jpg)

item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: Indigoo
item.description:
Like your more dubstep-ish tracks like tick tock, bipolar and midnight drive, though your dance and EDM stuff really isn’t for me. Reborn seems cool too.
Feed back on some tracks:
Tick Tock-
Really cool atmospheric song! I think you really nailed that sort of eerie and dark vibe that fits well with dubstep.
Bipolar-
Great track with the nice melodic parts of your songs and the heavy insane drops of Xiejra!
You’ve got some really great tracks!

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.description:
Wow, Stardust is amazing! Great chorus. Maybe some more bass in the beginning though?

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
Wow, I don’t know why I haven’t checked out your latest songs before! Loving the dubstep vibes on Reborn, it’s great that you took on an rare Auxy genre. Great beat in Tick Tock VIP, but I think you should add some more chords though. Other than that, you’ve got a pretty great profile! @Xicon

Listening to some more of your tracks.

Read full topic

item.description:
There’s one more day for people to respond with feedback for Ekstrak, our forum member of the week.

Thanks to those who have replied already.

If you haven’t replied, jump in now… because you could be next week!

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: Stigmo
item.description:
Ok so I listened to a few of your tracks @Xicon , and they’re quite diverse (FB, DnB & House), which is cool! I’m really curious how the full album will sound, the preview sounds really cool! Stardust is good as well.
Tip: Be careful when using bass leads. In Stage Three and Tick Tock VIP the bass has a little distortion and there’s a little too much going on in the drop soundwise.
Keep it up!

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: TXA
item.description:
Alright just finished looking over your tracks @Xicon.

First off, I like your style. It is really creative and unique.

If you don’t mind, I have some tips for you-

  • Sometimes your tracks can be a bit simple, and it wouldn’t hurt to structure them better
  • Some of your tracks just feel like they are missing something (I’m not sure, maybe better-developed chords or ambience in the background?)
  • I feel like sometimes the songs get a little underwhelming for me

You’re on the right track man, don’t get me wrong. Just try to make your songs a bit more complex, add some more melodies, and I think you’ll be good to go
So far, good work!

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
I love the chords and just general calm feeling of tritanopia. My favourite song of u so far! Also that awesome album preview! Keep it up buddy.

Some feedback:
Maybe try keep the distortion a bit down for some tracks. Other than that you are doing great! Looking forward to your reborn album

Also try keeping the reposts down a bit

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback!
The songs in there are my projects, except for the DnB part and the second song. The First song is a collab with @Xiejra and the second is a remake of Neon Element.
So I guess you can say it’s sll my traks.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Checked out your tracks, focusing on the one’s you did alone.

The best parts were the industrial intro for Stage 3, the D’n’B in Tick Top VIP & the funky lead at the start of Midnight Drive which is a sound I always enjoy hearing.

Your Reborn Preview seems to take things to a whole new level, but not sure if those are your own tracks, remixes or collabs being previewed?

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: DontPartyWithGuns
item.description:
Your stuff is really interesting (to say the least). Its really not the style of stuff I listen to but its not bad. I think the only feedback I can give is to not have your basses so loud ijn your drops. They have a lot of sub bass and it throws you off if you’re wearing headphones.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 06: Ekstrak
item.dc:creator: Sylent
item.description:
Ok i just finished listening to all your songs!
I must say i really liked your style i think the flaw of your songs is it needs a better arrangement.
My favorite tracks of yours are
-Tritanopia: Really liked the vibes and the melody
-Midnight Drive: Very good for your first try on Future Bass!
-Bipolar: Really liked this one too it is different!
-Stardust: Must say this is really cool.
Overall your music is really nice!

Read full topic
